name: Note Fighter
description:
Help Steamy, the steampunk conductor, play along to your favorite symphonies from great classical composers like Mozart and Beethoven. Improve your note reading skills by tapping along to every note from classics like Moonlight Sonata and Ode to Joy.

A challenge on every note is what this game is all about. Practice your combat skills and your note reading abilities in true steampunk style!

Enhance your sight-reading skills
Challenging gamification to learn basic notes and test your music skills. Choose your favorite music and classic tunes and get ahead of your friends with every note you ace.

Excellent to beat the boredom blues
Feeling bored on the subway? Waiting for the bus? Put on your composer hat, try practicing some music and enjoy a challenge on every level with the ultimate Note Fighter!

A classic match made in musical heaven
Enjoy and learn how to play classic hits and eternal favorites in a new and exciting game. Addictive layout and clean interface for the musician in you!

Multiple Levels for Interactive Gameplay
Not one, but three different difficulty levels for music aficionados of any skill set. If you are a beginner, nail the easy and medium levels first and hit the hard mode when you are a pro. The practice mode is to get you started on your musical journey and enjoy basic tunes.
